roleset.name: ship again

example.name: passive, arg1 only
example.text: The local officials said that , the previous situation whereby large numbers of import and export goods of Jiangxi province had to be re-shipped through the Guangzhou portand the Shanghai port in the form of sparse packaging will be changed [*-22] completely *trace*.
